page.title: 12Morton Feast
page.content: Morton Feast is an annual event which takes place in the village at the beginning of July.It starts on Friday with a cross-country run.We entered 27 runners in this year's three-mile race, including our teacher Mr.Greig. Our best runner came in fifth,and our girls team came second in the female team event.On Saturday there is a five-a-side football competition.This year only our girls' were successful in winning a trophy.A disco is held on Saturday night.The boys had to take their shirts off this year and show their muscles.The best won a record token.We played games as well,like musical chairs,statues and doing animal impressions.On Sunday there is a cricket match and a fancy-dress contest.Unfortunately it rained this year and spoilt the match.The Feast lasts three days and is good fun.
